books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning historian tells the story of the settling of the Northwest Territory through five main characters.
books.name: THE PIONEERS

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: with related materials by The Washington Post
books.description: Redacted findings from the special counsel’s investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election and potential obstruction of justice by the president.
books.name: THE MUELLER REPORT

books.author: by Melinda Gates
books.description: The philanthropist shares stories of empowering women to improve society.
books.name: THE MOMENT OF LIFT

books.author: by the office of the special counsel
books.description: Redacted findings from the special counsel’s investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election and potential obstruction of justice by the president.
books.name: THE MUELLER REPORT

books.author: by Casey Cep
books.description: Harper Lee’s work on the true-crime story about a rural preacher accused of murdering five of his family members in the 1970s.
books.name: FURIOUS HOURS

books.author: with an introduction by Alan Dershowitz
books.description: Redacted findings from the special counsel’s investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election and potential obstruction of justice by the president.
books.name: THE MUELLER REPORT

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: A New York Times Op-Ed columnist espouses having an outward focus to attain a meaningful life.
books.name: THE SECOND MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Bill Geist
books.description: Coming-of-age anecdotes set in a 1960s Midwestern summer vacation destination.
books.name: LAKE OF THE OZARKS

books.author: by Rachel Held Evans
books.description: The late author's pursuit of a renewed faith in the community and her misgivings about organized religion.
books.name: SEARCHING FOR SUNDAY

books.author: by Chelsea Handler
books.description: The comedian chronicles going into therapy and becoming an advocate for change.
books.name: LIFE WILL BE THE DEATH OF ME

books.author: by Lori Gottlieb
books.description: A psychotherapist gains unexpected insights when she becomes another therapist’s patient.
books.name: MAYBE YOU SHOULD TALK TO SOMEONE

books.author: by Adam Savage
books.description: The star of “MythBusters” shares his tools for creativity.
books.name: EVERY TOOL'S A HAMMER

books.author: by Jill Biden
books.description: The former second lady’s challenges in being a mother, educator and political spouse.
books.name: WHERE THE LIGHT ENTERS
